mn63:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
mn63:2.1: Atha kho ayasmato malukyaputtassa rahogatassa patisallinassa evam cetaso parivitakko udapadi:
mn63:2.3: ‘sassato loko’tipi, ‘asassato loko’tipi, ‘antava loko’tipi, ‘anantava loko’tipi, ‘tam jivam tam sariran’tipi, ‘annam jivam annam sariran’tipi, ‘hoti tathagato param marana’tipi, ‘na hoti tathagato param marana’tipi, ‘hoti ca na ca hoti tathagato param marana’tipi, ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana’tipi—
mn63:2.5: Yani me bhagava na byakaroti tam me na ruccati, tam me nakkhamati.
mn63:2.9: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana’ti va—
mn63:2.13: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana’ti va—
mn63:3.1: Atha kho ayasma malukyaputto sayanhasamayam patisallana vutthito yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma malukyaputto bhagavantam etadavoca:
mn63:3.2: “Idha mayham, bhante, rahogatassa patisallinassa evam cetaso parivitakko udapadi—
mn63:3.3: yanimani ditthigatani bhagavata abyakatani thapitani patikkhittani:
mn63:3.5: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana’tipi—
mn63:3.7: Yani me bhagava na byakaroti tam me na ruccati, tam me nakkhamati.
mn63:3.11: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana’ti va—
mn63:3.15: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana’ti va—
mn63:3.22: ‘sassato loko’ti va, ‘asassato loko’ti va, ajanato kho pana apassato etadeva ujukam hoti yadidam:
mn63:3.29: ‘antava loko’ti va, ‘anantava loko’ti va, ajanato kho pana apassato etadeva ujukam hoti yadidam:
mn63:3.32: ‘tam jivam tam sariran’ti, ‘tam jivam tam sariran’ti me bhagava byakarotu;
mn63:3.34: ‘annam jivam annam sariran’ti, ‘annam jivam annam sariran’ti me bhagava byakarotu.
mn63:3.36: ‘tam jivam tam sariran’ti va, ‘annam jivam annam sariran’ti va, ajanato kho pana apassato etadeva ujukam hoti yadidam:
mn63:3.39: ‘hoti tathagato param marana’ti, ‘hoti tathagato param marana’ti me bhagava byakarotu;
mn63:3.41: ‘na hoti tathagato param marana’ti, ‘na hoti tathagato param marana’ti me bhagava byakarotu.
mn63:3.43: ‘hoti tathagato param marana’ti va, ‘na hoti tathagato param marana’ti va, ajanato kho pana apassato etadeva ujukam hoti yadidam:
mn63:3.46: ‘hoti ca na ca hoti tathagato param marana’ti, ‘hoti ca na ca hoti tathagato param marana’ti me bhagava byakarotu;
mn63:3.48: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana’ti, ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana’ti me bhagava byakarotu.
mn63:3.50: ‘hoti ca na ca hoti tathagato param marana’ti va, ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana’ti va, ajanato kho pana apassato etadeva ujukam hoti yadidam:
mn63:4.2: ‘ehi tvam, malukyaputta, mayi brahmacariyam cara, aham te byakarissami:
mn63:4.3: “sassato loko”ti va, “asassato loko”ti va, “antava loko”ti va, “anantava loko”ti va, “tam jivam tam sariran”ti va, “annam jivam annam sariran”ti va, “hoti tathagato param marana”ti va, “na hoti tathagato param marana”ti va, “hoti ca na ca hoti tathagato param marana”ti va, “neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana”ti va’”ti?
mn63:4.6: ‘aham, bhante, bhagavati brahmacariyam carissami, bhagava me byakarissati:
mn63:4.7: “sassato loko”ti va, “asassato loko”ti va, “antava loko”ti va, “anantava loko”ti va, “tam jivam tam sariran”ti va, “annam jivam annam sariran”ti va, “hoti tathagato param marana”ti va, “na hoti tathagato param marana”ti va, “hoti ca na ca hoti tathagato param marana”ti va, “neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana”ti va’”ti?
mn63:4.10: ‘ehi tvam, malukyaputta, mayi brahmacariyam cara, aham te byakarissami:
mn63:4.12: “neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param maranati va”’ti;
mn63:4.14: ‘aham, bhante, bhagavati brahmacariyam carissami, bhagava me byakarissati:
mn63:4.16: “neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana”ti va’ti.
mn63:4.17: Evam sante, moghapurisa, ko santo kam paccacikkhasi?
mn63:5.2: ‘na tavaham bhagavati brahmacariyam carissami yava me bhagava na byakarissati:
mn63:5.4: “neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana”ti va’ti,
mn63:5.5: abyakatameva tam, malukyaputta, tathagatena assa, atha so puggalo kalam kareyya.
mn63:5.6: Seyyathapi, malukyaputta, puriso sallena viddho assa savisena galhapalepanena.
mn63:5.7: Tassa mittamacca natisalohita bhisakkam sallakattam upatthapeyyum.
mn63:5.9: ‘na tavaham imam sallam aharissami yava na tam purisam janami yenamhi viddho, khattiyo va brahmano va vesso va suddo va’ti;
mn63:5.11: ‘na tavaham imam sallam aharissami yava na tam purisam janami yenamhi viddho, evamnamo evangotto iti va’ti;
mn63:5.13: ‘na tavaham imam sallam aharissami yava na tam purisam janami yenamhi viddho, digho va rasso va majjhimo va’ti;
mn63:5.15: ‘na tavaham imam sallam aharissami yava na tam purisam janami yenamhi viddho, kalo va samo va manguracchavi va’ti;
mn63:5.17: ‘na tavaham imam sallam aharissami yava na tam purisam janami yenamhi viddho, amukasmim game va nigame va nagare va’ti;
mn63:5.19: ‘na tavaham imam sallam aharissami yava na tam dhanum janami yenamhi viddho, yadi va capo yadi va kodando’ti;
mn63:5.21: ‘na tavaham imam sallam aharissami yava na tam jiyam janami yayamhi viddho, yadi va akkassa yadi va sanhassa yadi va nharussa yadi va maruvaya yadi va khirapannino’ti;
mn63:5.23: ‘na tavaham imam sallam aharissami yava na tam kandam janami yenamhi viddho, yadi va gaccham yadi va ropiman’ti;
mn63:5.25: ‘na tavaham imam sallam aharissami yava na tam kandam janami yenamhi viddho, yassa pattehi vajitam yadi va gijjhassa yadi va kankassa yadi va kulalassa yadi va morassa yadi va sithilahanuno’ti;
mn63:5.27: ‘na tavaham imam sallam aharissami yava na tam kandam janami yenamhi viddho, yassa nharuna parikkhittam yadi va gavassa yadi va mahimsassa yadi va bheravassa yadi va semharassa’ti;
mn63:5.29: ‘na tavaham imam sallam aharissami yava na tam sallam janami yenamhi viddho, yadi va sallam yadi va khurappam yadi va vekandam yadi va naracam yadi va vacchadantam yadi va karavirapattan’ti—
mn63:5.30: annatameva tam, malukyaputta, tena purisena assa, atha so puriso kalam kareyya.
mn63:5.31: Evameva kho, malukyaputta, yo evam vadeyya:
mn63:5.32: ‘na tavaham bhagavati brahmacariyam carissami yava me bhagava na byakarissati:
mn63:5.34: “neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana”ti va’ti—
mn63:5.35: abyakatameva tam, malukyaputta, tathagatena assa, atha so puggalo kalam kareyya.
mn63:6.1: ‘Sassato loko’ti, malukyaputta, ditthiya sati brahmacariyavaso abhavissati, evam no.
mn63:6.2: ‘Asassato loko’ti, malukyaputta, ditthiya sati brahmacariyavaso abhavissati, evampi no.
mn63:6.3: ‘Sassato loko’ti va, malukyaputta, ditthiya sati, ‘asassato loko’ti va ditthiya sati attheva jati, atthi jara, atthi maranam, santi sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupayasa;
mn63:6.5: ‘Antava loko’ti, malukyaputta, ditthiya sati brahmacariyavaso abhavissati, evam no.
mn63:6.6: ‘Anantava loko’ti, malukyaputta, ditthiya sati brahmacariyavaso abhavissati, evampi no.
mn63:6.7: ‘Antava loko’ti va, malukyaputta, ditthiya sati, ‘anantava loko’ti va ditthiya sati attheva jati, atthi jara, atthi maranam, santi sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupayasa;
mn63:6.9: ‘Tam jivam tam sariran’ti, malukyaputta, ditthiya sati brahmacariyavaso abhavissati, evam no.
mn63:6.10: ‘Annam jivam annam sariran’ti, malukyaputta, ditthiya sati brahmacariyavaso abhavissati, evampi no.
mn63:6.11: ‘Tam jivam tam sariran’ti va, malukyaputta, ditthiya sati, ‘annam jivam annam sariran’ti va ditthiya sati attheva jati …pe…
mn63:6.13: ‘Hoti tathagato param marana’ti, malukyaputta, ditthiya sati brahmacariyavaso abhavissati, evam no.
mn63:6.14: ‘Na hoti tathagato param marana’ti, malukyaputta, ditthiya sati brahmacariyavaso abhavissati, evampi no.
mn63:6.15: ‘Hoti tathagato param marana’ti va, malukyaputta, ditthiya sati, ‘na hoti tathagato param marana’ti va ditthiya sati attheva jati …pe…
mn63:6.17: ‘Hoti ca na ca hoti tathagato param marana’ti, malukyaputta, ditthiya sati brahmacariyavaso abhavissati, evam no.
mn63:6.18: ‘Neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana’ti, malukyaputta, ditthiya sati brahmacariyavaso abhavissati, evampi no.
mn63:6.19: ‘Hoti ca na ca hoti tathagato param marana’ti, malukyaputta, ditthiya sati, ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana’ti va ditthiya sati attheva jati …pe…
mn63:7.1: Tasmatiha, malukyaputta, abyakatanca me abyakatato dharetha;
mn63:7.19: ‘hoti ca na ca hoti tathagato param marana’ti—
mn63:7.21: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana’ti—
mn63:8.2: Na hetam, malukyaputta, atthasamhitam na adibrahmacariyakam na nibbidaya na viragaya na nirodhaya na upasamaya na abhinnaya na sambodhaya na nibbanaya samvattati.
mn63:10.2: Etanhi, malukyaputta, atthasamhitam etam adibrahmacariyakam nibbidaya viragaya nirodhaya upasamaya abhinnaya sambodhaya nibbanaya samvattati.
mn63:10.4: Tasmatiha, malukyaputta, abyakatanca me abyakatato dharetha;
mn63:10.7: Attamano ayasma malukyaputto bhagavato bhasitam abhinanditi.
